text: Abaningi abantu bencwadi bafisa sengathi banganiphindisela emumva ekungakholweni, emva kokuba senikholiwe ngenxa yomona wabo, emuva kweqiniso selibonakalisiwe lacaca kubona, ngakho-ke thethelelani ninganaki kuze kufike umyalelo kaMvelinqangi, ngempela uMvelinqangi unamandla ngaphezu kwakho konke
